NoviCap | Barcelona, ES | Software engineers

NoviCap enables businesses to get early payments against their outstanding invoices. We are early-stage and rapidly growing and we are looking for great people to work with us.

At the moment we're hiring

  - ruby engineers
  - UI/UX front-end developers
We're also interested in talking to machine learning experts and security specialists to join later this year.

Feel free to reach out to me at nicolas@novicap.com
